title: Best of the Program | Guest: Steve Deace | 1/27/20
description:
NBA legend Kobe Bryant and his 13-year-old daughter were among nine killed this weekend in a tragic helicopter crash. But the media brings up rape allegations against him, and did one MSNBC host say “L.A. Nakers” or something worse? Meanwhile, President Trump’s defense team obliterated the House managers’ 24-hour case in only two hours. Glenn plays “Good People, Bad People, Dumb People” with an SUV, Hillary Clinton, and the world’s worst robber. “Nancy Pelosi Sucks” pens are on sale now at NancyPelosiSucksPen.com, brought to you by Stu Does America! BlazeTV’s Steve Deace confirms that just days before the Iowa caucuses, Biden’s lead is disappearing, and nobody seems to care.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
